author: Brodie Robertson
description:
Session restoration or restore is a very important feature for a lot of people and it's never really worked perfectly but on Wayland there's a chance to make it happen and with the protocol falling further into place we're closer than ever to make that happen.

title: One Step Closer To Wayland Session Restore
